net.openhft.chronicle.bytes

Interface BytesStore<B extends BytesStore<B,Underlying>,Underlying>

  • All Superinterfaces:
    AutoCloseable, Closeable, RandomCommon<B,Access<Underlying>,Underlying>, RandomDataInput<B,Access<Underlying>,Underlying>, RandomDataOutput<B,Access<Underlying>,Underlying>, net.openhft.chronicle.core.ReferenceCounted
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    Bytes<Underlying>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractBytes, ExpectedBytesStore, HeapBytesStore, MappedBytes, MappedBytesStore, NativeBytes, NativeBytesStore, NoBytesStore, PointerBytesStore, SubBytes, SubZeroedBytes, VanillaBytes, ZeroedBytes

    public interface BytesStore<B extends BytesStore<B,Underlying>,Underlying>
extends RandomDataInput<B,Access<Underlying>,Underlying>, RandomDataOutput<B,Access<Underlying>,Underlying>, net.openhft.chronicle.core.ReferenceCounted
    A reference to some bytes with fixed extents. Only offset access within the capacity is possible.
